trans-unit.source: Creates a quadratic Bezier curve between two points in a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>.
Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to create composite shapes using QuadraticBezierSegment objects and other segments.
The QuadraticBezierSegment class does not contain a property for the starting point of the line.

The starting point of the line is the end point of the previous segment, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> if no other segments exist.

Freezable Features Because QuadraticBezierSegment objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe.
For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> class with the specified control point, end point, and Boolean indicating whether to stroke this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
The control point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
The end point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> is to be stroked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets or sets the control <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> of the curve.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The control point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point1*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the end <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The end point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point2*> dependency property.
To be added.
